mapper.select: SELECT p.petid, p.userid, p.petname, p.petbreed, p.birthdate, p.pettypeid, p.createdat, p.pfile, p.page, p.pgender FROM pets p JOIN users u ON p.userid = u.userid WHERE u.userid = #{userId} ORDER BY p.createdat DESC
SELECT p.petid, p.petname, p.petbreed, p.birthdate, p.pettypeid, p.createdat, p.pfile, p.page, p.pgender FROM pets p WHERE p.userid = #{userId} AND p.petid = #{petId}
SELECT p.petid, p.userid, u.email, p.petname, p.petbreed, p.birthdate, p.pettypeid, p.createdat, p.pfile, p.page, p.pgender FROM pets p JOIN users u ON p.userid = u.userid WHERE p.petid = #{petId}

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM pets WHERE petid = #{petId} AND userid = #{userId}
